column4: I have tried to install flash player any way I can, can someone please tell me why it wont work in Firefox?
What version of Ubuntu/Firefox do you have?  And what version of the flash player did you try installing?
Also, please explain what "doesn't work" means.
With the flash player, extract the libflashplugin.so file into /usr/lib/firefox/plugins   Then restart firefox and you should be good to go.
